entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as the one who drew Harry's attention back onto himself, possibly to remind him that he had just rescued him from the lake.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as feeling stupid and wondering why he didn't grab Ron and go first.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone Harry could have grabbed to be the first back.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone who didn't waste time worrying about anyone else and didn't take the merpeople seriously.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as crouching at the water's edge, deep in conversation with a chief merperson.

entities.name: merperson
entities.description: Merpeople are mentioned as being taken seriously by Cedric and Krum.

relationships.description: Krum rescued Harry from the lake.
Dumbledore is in conversation with a chief merperson.
Harry could have grabbed Ron to be the first back.
